EmailTemplate.name: Email 1: Reg Confirmation / Upload your Health Information
EmailTemplate.subject: [Action Required]: COVID-19 Protocol for attending a Salesforce event in Davos
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
-Please do not forward- Hi {!Contact.Name},
To ensure the health and safety of our in-person attendees, and the community at Davos, we have protocols in place before and during the event.
Action Required: Please upload your health status documentation to Salesforce Safety Cloud. This is an essential step in supporting Safety as our #1 value for this event. Every step you take in our safety protocol goes a long way in keeping everyone safe. Required documentation includes:
* Proof of being Fully Vaccinated (including 3rd Dose / Booster After June 21, 2021) * Primary Test - Negative PCR test taken no longer than 72 hours before arrival in Davos, or a Negative professionally administered or observed antigen test taken no longer than 24 hours before arrival in Davos * Secondary Test - PCR taken at Welcome Center within 24hrs of arrival (Note: If you have tested positive for COVID-19 since April 11, your PCR may be replaced by a second antigen test)
To expedite the onsite check in process, this can be done in advance before arriving onsite by using the Safety Cloud portal below:
https://safetycloudfy23.secure.force.com/wefdavos?externalId={!Contact.Dreampass_ExternalId__c}&firstName={!Contact.FirstName}&lastName={!Contact.LastName}&company={!Contact.Dreampass_CompanyName__c}&email={!Contact.Email}&attendeeType={!Contact.Dreampass_AttendeeType__c}
Please note all attendees are required to visit the Salesforce Welcome Center prior to attending a Salesforce event to check in and receive a Dreampass.
The Salesforce Welcome Center is located at: 81 Promenade, Davos Platz * Monday - Tuesday from 6:30 a.m. - 8:30 p.m. CET * Wednesday from 6:30 a.m. - 11:59 p.m. CET Questions? Please reach out to davos@salesforce.com.
We look forward to welcoming you safely in Davos!
Thanks, Salesforce Davos Team
Please note that any handling of your personal data will be done in accordance with the Salesforce Privacy Statement.
